sentences.en: But whoever has undergone the intense experience of successful advances made in this domain is moved by profound reverence for the rationality made manifest in existence.
sentences.cn: 但凡是曾经在这个领域里胜利前进中有过深切经验的人，对存在中所显示出来的合理性，都会感到深挚的崇敬。

sentences.en: He believed that rationality had triumphed.
sentences.cn: 他认为理性终究占了上风.

sentences.en: However, the rationality of the market structure, the less coordination.
sentences.cn: 但就市场结构合理性而言, 不甚协调.

sentences.en: I think, Nietzsche did not reject science and not negate rationality completely.
sentences.cn: 本文认为, 尼采并不拒绝科学,也不完全否定理性.

sentences.en: In my books, I argue that rationality is one of the most important human values.
sentences.cn: 在我的著作当中，我认为合理性是人类最重要的价值之一。

sentences.en: In the case of uncertainty, the definition of rationality becomes problematic.
sentences.cn: 在非确定型的情况, 合理性的概念却难以确定.

sentences.en: Intellectuality and rationality can not directly deal with these ultra logical categories.
sentences.cn: 知性、理性无法直接面对这些超逻辑的范畴.

sentences.en: Now we shall use the rationality condition to fulfill our promise.
sentences.cn: 现在我们将使用有理性条件来履行我们的诺言.

sentences.en: Organizational effectiveness does not lie in that narrow minded concept called rationality. It lies in the blend of clearheaded logic and powerful intuition.
sentences.cn: 组织的有效性并不在于那个称为合理性的坐井观天的概念。它是清晰的逻辑和强有力的直觉的融合。

sentences.en: Presents key issues of bounded rationality, uncertainty, complexity, and opportunism.
sentences.cn: 提出有限理性 、 不确定性 、 复杂性 、 和机会主义等关键议题.

sentences.en: Rationality is the essential question which puzzles modern philosophy and human life.
sentences.cn: 摘要合理性是困扰着当代哲学和人类生活的根本问题.

sentences.en: Rationality of the design and well performance is illuminated by experimentation.
sentences.cn: 试验结果表明电机设计合理、性能良好.

sentences.en: The anti - circumvention clause has its " validity and rationality. "
sentences.cn: 反 规避条款有其存在的 合法性 和合理性.

sentences.en: The military conceptual model is the first abstract to the military action world(space), the accuracy and rationality it expresses the military system is the key point of battle simulation.
sentences.cn: 军事概念模型是对军事行为空间进行的第一次抽象，它对军事系统表达的准确性和合理性将是作战仿真模拟质量的关键。

sentences.en: We can only speak of rationality relative to a frame of reference.
sentences.cn: 我们只能相对于一种参照系来谈论合理性.

sentences.en: We live in an era of rationality.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在理性的时代。
我们断言理性是人类的属性.

sentences.en: When the final vote came, rationality took over.
sentences.cn: 最后一轮投票时，理性占了上风。

words.tran_cn: 理性主义者，唯理主义者
实行合理化；作辩解；合理地思考
使……合理化；使……有理化；为……找借口

trans.tran_cn: 合理性，（常复数）合理的行动（或见解、措施等）
